titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 306: Seliḥah

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Each verse begins a new line; folio starts with the last line of an unknown piyyuṭ; followed, without a graphic text break, by a piyyuṭ of the Seliḥah type נפשי לך תתחנן; five strophes that consist of two verses, which alternate -נפשי לך ת and -אף רוחי ת; piyyuṭ ends in the upper quarter of the verso, the rest is blank; partial vocalization.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 10 (recto), 3 (verso); ruling method: left rule justified by cramping exceeding word between lines.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
